dowloadFile

@RequestMapping(value="/{attachmentid}/{filename}/download.htm",
                method=GET)
public void dowloadFile(@PathVariable(value="attachmentid")
                                       java.lang.Long id,
                                       javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Handles download requests. Returns the requested file via the output stream of response. Throws an exception if requested file is not found.

Parameters:
id - the id of the requested file
response - the http response object
